attributes.action: KEEP DRIVING TEST CENTRES OPEN FOR PEOPLE WHO HAVE ALREADY BOOKED THEY’RE TESTS
attributes.background: I want them to keep the driving test centres open for people who have already booked they’re driving tests as it’s not fair. A lot of time money and energy has been wasted already and it is mentally frustrating.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
